title: Bu Mie Shen Wang
overview: The financial genius Wang Ke was accidentally brought to the divine universe by his ancestral divine sword, and with the family heirloom of the Sun Immortal divine kung fu, he started low and went high to enter the immortal sect. With his talent and resourcefulness, Wang can make his way to win the heart of a beautiful woman, build a business empire, and step by step set out to defend the way and eliminate the devil, finally becoming the indestructible God King.
